title: Early-Stage Dementia Characteristics
description: Interactive wheel diagram showing characteristics of early-stage dementia across five key domains (cognitive, functional, personality, behavioral, and mood), highlighting what is impaired versus what remains preserved to support person-centered care approaches.
creator: Dementia Education Project
subject: dementia
early-stage dementia
cognitive assessment
functional abilities
person-centered care
caregiving
dementia stages
neurodegeneration
prerequisites: familiarity with activities of daily living (ADLs)
